#summary Known class loader leaks in various products

= WebSphere =

* [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg1IZ67457 IZ67457]: May affect any application running on WAS 7 with a JDK < SR8.
* [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg1PK83186 PK83186]: Affects all applications using message driven beans running on WAS < 6.1.0.27 and WAS < 7.0.0.5.
* [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg1PM04639 PM04639]: May randomly affect a single application on WAS < 6.1.0.33 and WAS < 7.0.0.15.
* [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg1PM18729 PM18729]: Affects applications using JAX-RPC or JAX-WS on WAS < 6.1.0.35 and WAS < 7.0.0.13.
* [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg1PM21638 PM21638]: Affects JSP and JSF applications running on WAS < 7.0.0.15.

= Axis 1.x =

* [https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AXIS-2674 AXIS-2674]: Affects all applications using Axis 1.4.
